summary: After one too many run ins with the law, a punk teenager from a working class background is sent to prep school by his frustrated dad, and learns a thing or two.
cast: Shawn Hatosy|Tommy Bone|Samantha Lavigne|Jonathan Brandis|Adam LaVorgna|Jesse Leach|Jon Abrahams|Alec Baldwin|Richard Jenkins|Mike Cerrone|George Wendt|Robert Turano|Kristen Shorten|Timothy Crowe|Meghan Duffy|Gabriel Mann|George Martin|Jack Ferver|Christopher Jewett|Alex Toma|Sean Gildea|Bernie Sheredy|Amy Smart|Jimmy Landi|Amy Van Nostrand|Mark O'Connell|Seth William Meier|Nicholas Cardi|Vincent Mesolella|Joshua Moore|Scott Rabideau|David Vaillancourt|Libby Langdon|Johnny O'Hern|Gus Albero|Tom Paolino|Eric Brown|Robert W. Jordan|Harry Cooper|Steve Cerrone|Johnny Cicco|Kevin Gilmore|Max Ricci|Kate Lohman|Nigel Gore|John J. Burke|Kyle Pepi|Ryan Pepi|Sarah Billington|Frank Ferendo|Chris Ferretti|David Gere|Jason Kolinsky|Lynn L'Heureux|Stephen Radochia|Mike Sablone|Galeit Sehayek|David Zielinski
title: No puedo perderte por algo tan tonto como el sexo
